article_title: IDF officers sacked over fatal aid worker attack
sentence: Two  senior  Israeli  military  officers  have  been  sacked  after  seven  aid  workers  were  killed  in  missile  strikes  in  the  Gaza  Strip.

article_title: IDF officers sacked over fatal aid worker attack
sentence: In  the  space  of  four  minutes  on  1  April,  seven  people  working  for  WCK  were  killed  when  three  missiles  destroyed  their  cars  one  by  one.

article_title: IDF officers sacked over fatal aid worker attack
sentence: One  of  the  seven  aid  workers  killed  was  a  Polish  national.

sentence: UN  Secretary  General  Antonio  Guterres  said  196  aid  workers  had  died  since  the  conflict  began  and  called  for  a  "meaningful  increase"  in  the  amount  of  supplies  allowed  into  Gaza.

article_title: IDF officers sacked over fatal aid worker attack
sentence: Much  of  the  Gaza  Strip  has  been  devastated  during  the  Israeli  military  operations  that  began  after  Hamas  gunmen  attacked  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  seizing  253  hostages.

sentence: More  than  33,091  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  then,  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says.
